supportDesc.support: Fragments 1-17 (in mm), (1) 20 x 41, (A) 2 lines, left margin, (B) blank, (2) 23 x 23, (A) 4 lines, left margin, (B) blank, (3) 53 x 33, (A) 6 lines, left margin, (B) blank, (4) 57 x 40, (A) 7 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (5) 64 x 28, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) 5 lines, bottom margin, (6) 72 x 13, (A) 5 lines, left margin, (B) 7 lines, no margins, (7) 50 x 45, (A) 5 lines, left (?) bottom margin, (B) 1 line, right bottom margin, (8) 51 x 34, (A) 9 lines, no margins, (B) 7 lines, no margins, (9) 63 x 23, (A) 6 lines, left margin, (B) traces, (10) 37 x 19, (A) 4 lines, bottom margin (?), (B) blank, (11) 65 x 36, (A) 4 lines, left bottom margins, (B) blank, (12) 28 x 19, (A) 4 lines, top margin, (B) blank, (13) 65 x 34, (A) 6 lines, top right margins,(B) 7 lines, no margins, (14) 50 x 29, (A) 2 lines, no margins (?), (B) blank, (15) 45 x 36, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) traces, (16) 44 x 16, (A) 4 lines, bottom (?) margin, (B) blank, (17) 67 x 83, (A) 3 lines, top margin, (B) 3 lines, right margin

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.
